headline: Market Chatter: Blackstone Hires Credit Dealmakers From KKR, Ares Management

headline: Buy The Dip: High-Yield High-Growth Stocks Getting Way Too Cheap
summary: The Federal Reserve's announcement of fewer rate cuts has caused market panic, accelerating pullbacks in stocks. I share two high-yield, high-growth stocks that appear to be overlooked now.

raw.headline: Buy The Dip: High-Yield High-Growth Stocks Getting Way Too Cheap

headline: Rethinking Stock Market Trump Trades
summary: A reevaluation of which stocks and sectors have, will, or could potentially in the future see outsized gains due to the re-election of Donald Trump. Read what investors need to know.
